name: Super Bug
summary: Super Bug is an arcade game developed, manufactured, and released by Atari, Inc. in 1977. The player steers a yellow Volkswagen Beetle (or "Bug") along a multidirectionally scrolling track, avoiding the boundaries and occasional obstacle. The game ends when fuel runs out. Super Bug is in black and white, and the colored car comes from a yellow overlay in the center of the monitor.
info:
• 开发: Atari
  • 发行: Atari
  • 平台: 街机
  • 游戏类型: RAC
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 1977年9月
  • 游戏设计师: Howard Delman
